select t.INVESTOR_NO,t.INVESTOR_NAME,t.MEDIATOR_NAME,t.DEPT_NAME,sum(t.AVAILABLE_FUNDS) as AVAILABLE_FUNDS, to_char(sum(t.INTEREST_AMOUNT),'fm9999999999990.0099') as INTEREST_AMOUNT from T_REPORT_REBATE t
to_char(t.TRADE_DATE,'yyyy-mm') = #{month, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and DEPT_NAME like '%'||#{depName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
group by t.INVESTOR_NO,t.INVESTOR_NAME,t.MEDIATOR_NAME,t.DEPT_NAME

select t.DEPT_NAME,sum(t.AVAILABLE_FUNDS) as AVAILABLE_FUNDS, to_char(sum(t.INTEREST_AMOUNT),'fm9999999999990.0099') as INTEREST_AMOUNT, to_char(sum(round(t.AVAILABLE_FUNDS*0.0195/360,2) - t.INTEREST_AMOUNT),'fm9999999999990.0099') as INTEREST_REMAIN from T_REPORT_REBATE t
to_char(t.TRADE_DATE,'yyyy-mm') = #{month, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and DEPT_NAME like '%'||#{depName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
group by t.DEPT_NAME

select MARKETER_NO,MARKETER_NAME,DEP_NAME,sum(INTEREST) as INTEREST from( select marketerNo as MARKETER_NO,b.MARKETER_NAME,F_GETDEPNAME(a.INVESTOR_NO) as DEP_NAME,sum(interest) as INTEREST from (select F_GETMARKETERNO(t.INVESTOR_NO) as marketerNo,t.INVESTOR_NAME, t.INVESTOR_NO, round(case when t.fix_proportion is not null then ((0.0195-t.FIX_PROPORTION)/t.FIX_PROPORTION)*t.INTEREST_AMOUNT else decode(t.daily_rights,0,0.0195*t.AVAILABLE_FUNDS/360,((0.0195-t.daily_rights)/t.daily_rights)*t.INTEREST_AMOUNT) end,2) as interest, t.DEPT_NAME,t.TRADE_DATE from T_REPORT_REBATE t where not EXISTS (select 1 from MARKET_CUSTTEMP t2,T_CRM_CUSTOMER t3,T_CRM_MEDIATOR t4 where t3.BELONG_TYPE = '2' and t4.MEDIATOR_NO = t3.BELONG_TO and t2.TYPE = '3' and t2.CUSTNAME = t4.MEDIATOR_NAME and t3.INVESTOR_NO = t.investor_no and t2.DBL16 = 0 ) ) a, T_CRM_MARKETER b where a.marketerNo = b.MARKETER_NO and to_char(a.TRADE_DATE,'yyyy-mm') = #{month, jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by marketerNo,b.MARKETER_NAME,F_GETDEPNAME(a.INVESTOR_NO)
UNION all
select t.MARKET_NO as MARKETER_NO,t.MARKET_NAME as MARKETER_NAME ,F_GETDEPNAME(t.INVESTOR_NO) as DEP_NAME ,sum(t.INTEREST_AMOUNT) as INTEREST from T_REPORT_MARKETER_INTEREST t where not EXISTS (select 1 from MARKET_CUSTTEMP t2,T_CRM_CUSTOMER t3,T_CRM_MEDIATOR t4 where t3.BELONG_TYPE = '2' and t4.MEDIATOR_NO = t3.BELONG_TO and t2.TYPE = '3' and t2.CUSTNAME = t4.MEDIATOR_NAME and t3.INVESTOR_NO = t.investor_no and t2.DBL16 = 0 ) and to_char(t.TRADE_DATE,'yyyy-mm') = #{month, jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t.MARKET_NO,t.MARKET_NAME ,F_GETDEPNAME(t.INVESTOR_NO)) group by MARKETER_NO,MARKETER_NAME,DEP_NAME
